scripts.db:cli: sudo docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -d cadastro_db
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:drop: sudo docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS cadastro_db;'
scripts.db:create: sudo docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE cadastro_db;'
